title: Sivir's spell shild only blocks things it wants.... plis.. why you do this..
body: I play Sivir a lot and the spell shield is super handy!! but I can't help feeling that it needs to be reworked a little due to the fact it is very selective in what things it blocks and what things it doesn't like for example it will happy block blitz or threshes pulls but not Leona's?? it does stop the dmg and give you mana but it doesn't stop her from pulling herself to you?? why?? and Draven's spinning axes? they are I guess an auto attack but they come from a spell so why can't I block them? or Gnars q? only blocks one way and does dmg and slows on the way back making it completely useless .... like plis...

replies.body: LoL has always had inconsistencies with abilities, but some of them are needed to allow a healthy level of counter-play. An example being yasuo's wall not making fizz ult or ori ball dissappear.
kinda funny that it says 'blocks an ability' when it should say "blocks and ability that scales off ap"

F*ck I love Gnar boomeranging Sivir.

It wouldn't be League if you couldn't Flash and Grab a Lantern only to have Garen ulti cast from 3K Range, or if you couldn't flash Grab a Lantern and Get Darius grabbed from 4K Range, or if you couldn't Ezreal E and drag Blitzs arm off or Flash and have Xin Q kill you from over a Ledge 500 range away so you essentially just Corpse Flashed.
